channel.title: [Pi] Adding Timer To Npc
channel.description:
case 239: if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.buydelay < 864000) { // 24 hours c.getItems().addItem(620,1200); c.sendMessage("You Have gotten 1200 tickets."); } else { //<<< When I add that c.buydelay = System.currentTimeMillis(); c.sendMessage("Time: " + c.buydelay + ""); c.sendMessage("Please Wait 24 hours to get tickets."); } break;
Well What i was trying to do is. You need tickets to thieve, and to get tickets you click the npc, once clicked the npc it gives you 1200 tickets every 24 hours. But the timer is not working..... It Doesn't give tickets first click then all the clicks after the first one it gives you 1200 tickets.

item.title: [Pi] Adding Timer To Npc
item.dc:creator: @skillingman8 skillingman8
item.description:
@skillingman8 wrote:

Well What i was trying to do is. You need tickets to thieve, and to get tickets you click the npc, once clicked the npc it gives you 1200 tickets every 24 hours. But the timer is not working… It Doesn’t give tickets first click then all the clicks after the first one it gives you 1200 tickets.
